Title: Three and a Half Men
Writer: Noah Garfinkel, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam Devine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dominic Dierkes (story editor), Sean Clements (story editor)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam Devine, Anders Holm, Maribeth Monroe
Plot: The guys film a documentary about Karl's medical procedure.
